channel.title: hugo on Keep Calm and Carry On Coding
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Keep Calm and Carry On Coding

item.title: HUGO 安装指南
item.description: Guide to host Hugo with Github Page Prerequisites Mac Github 2FA enabled Git installed Github regular personal user (not Enterprise) Github page created Github Create a NEW repo on Github, e.g. blog, so the url for this new repo should be https://github.com/<username>/blog Go to Settings Developer settings Personal access tokens Generate new token Click the options Generate Copy to somewhere safe Now you have a token/password/passphrase. Local brew install hugo
